subject: Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hi there,

On aliexpress I ordered Simsonn Plus X racing pedals (Set of 3) where in
the picture of the option they are mounted on a baseplate. Then I contacted
you and you replied that the baseplate is sold separately.

[image: image.png] [image: image.png]


What is the difference between those two options? Since you already said
that baseplate is sold separately. Which means that also second option
doesn't include baseplate even though its on the photo of the option.
Meaning: both options are the same, with both you get three pedals, without
the baseplate, just the second one costs 70eur more.

I already canceled the order now because of this discrepancy. Please
clarify the difference.

conversations.body_text: Hi Sadek Elouissi,    I don't understand these distinctions. You can order directly from the official website to get better after-sales support.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals
